ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the osu repository include fixes for hitcircle sprite visibility issues, adjustments to beat snap divisor defaults, and updates to the framework. Several pull requests have been submitted and merged, addressing issues such as the volume adjustment using the scroll wheel during intro, background brightness at the main menu, and legacy hitcircle fallback logic. These changes aim to improve the overall user experience and resolve existing bugs.
